db:abstract.db:para: Defines an attribute and how data should be read from a Buffer.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description

db:listitem.db:para: VertexAttribute: used to define data to be read on a per vertex basis
IndexAttribute: used to define vertex indices when indexed draw calls are to be used
DrawIndirectAttribute: used to specify the DrawIndirect buffer to be used when indirect draw calls are to be used

db:note.db:para: when an attribute is of type DrawIndirectAttribute, only count, stride and offset are relevant.

db:section.db:para: When providing your own attributes, it may make sense to name your attribute using helpers such as QAttribute::defaultPositionAttributeName() as that will ensure your geometry will be compatible with picking and the various materials provided in the Qt3DExtras module.
